# samsungcloudplatform_certificate (Resource)

Provides a Certificate resource.


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "samsungcloudplatform_certificate" "my_certificate" {
  name = var.name
  key = "{encoded-data}"
  body = "{encoded-data}"
  chain = "{encoded-data}"
  recipients {
  }
  tags =  {
    tag_test = "tag_value"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `body` (String) Public Certificate
- `key` (String) Private Key
- `name` (String) Certificate Name
- `recipients` (Block List, Min: 1) recipients (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--recipients))

### Optional

- `chain` (String) Certificate Chain
- `tags` (Map of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--recipients"></a>
### Nested Schema for `recipients`

Optional:

- `email` (String)
- `user_id` (String)
- `user_name` (String)
